title: Letterpress stopmotion
content:
Decided to try my hand at animation :)

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XKmbO1qsreE](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014104909/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=XKmbO1qsreE "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XKmbO1qsreE")

Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014104909/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")
author: oprion

comments.content:
Lovely work!!!, stopmotion requires time and patience, but its effect with the music make a very fun composition. I would like to see the whole process of printing...

Sergio

@ Sergio  
The upcoming shorts should cover the whole thing.  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Personal Art and Design Portal of Ivan Gulkov  
 [www.ivangdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014104909/http:/www.ivangdesign.com/ "www.ivangdesign.com")

What a nice idea to produce a little movie about letterpresse.  
But, PLEASE!!!, there is a major mistake in it. DO NOT BELIEVE,  
WHAT YOU SEE...

The composition stick was hold in a wrong position.  
You have to hold it like you see here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014104909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Ansicht_5_3959.jpg)

Georg  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
„Ich bin ein Preuße, kennt Ihr meine Farben...“

@Georg

Ach! The horror! The shame!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014104909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stick_4202.gif)
  
Better?

A kid was often confused,  
When setting his p's and his q's  
He was very keen on qleasing the pueen  
Who wasn't entirely amused!
